message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price. I believe it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to make a fair deal. I'm offering it to you for $12,000. This is a great opportunity to get your hands on this valuable item, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal anywhere else.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. That's a bit high for me right now. I'd be willing to pay $8,000 for it.

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand that $12,000 might be a bit steep, but I'm not willing to go as low as $8,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $10,500. This is a fair price considering the value the product brings to you. Let me know if you're interested.
I appreciate you meeting me a bit, Alice.  While that's closer, I'm aiming for something closer to $9,000.

Hi Bob, I understand you're looking to get closer to your target price, but I'm still not comfortable going below $10,000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $9,500. This is the lowest I can go, and I think it's still a fair price considering the value the product brings to you. Let me know if you're willing to meet me at this price.
